mapper.insert: insert into EVALUATION_REPORT (ID, NO, DATE_REPORT, CAUSE, NAME, GENDER, DATE_BIRTH, AGENCY, ASSESSOR, LEVEL1RATING, PRELIMINARY_LEVEL, GRADE_CHANGE_CLAUSE, FINAL_GRADE, NURSING_GRADE) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateReport,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cause,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dateBirth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{agency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assessor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level1rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preliminaryLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradeChangeClause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finalGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nursingGrade,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update EVALUATION_REPORT set NO = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE_REPORT = #{dateReport,jdbcType=DATE}, CAUSE = #{cause,jdbcType=CHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, DATE_BIRTH = #{dateBirth,jdbcType=DATE}, AGENCY = #{agency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSESSOR = #{assessor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL1RATING = #{level1rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRELIMINARY_LEVEL = #{preliminaryLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADE_CHANGE_CLAUSE = #{gradeChangeClause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINAL_GRADE = #{finalGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NURSING_GRADE = #{nursingGrade,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, NO, DATE_REPORT, CAUSE, NAME, GENDER, DATE_BIRTH, AGENCY, ASSESSOR, LEVEL1RATING, PRELIMINARY_LEVEL, GRADE_CHANGE_CLAUSE, FINAL_GRADE, NURSING_GRADE from EVALUATION_REPORT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, NO, DATE_REPORT, CAUSE, NAME, GENDER, DATE_BIRTH, AGENCY, ASSESSOR, LEVEL1RATING, PRELIMINARY_LEVEL, GRADE_CHANGE_CLAUSE, FINAL_GRADE, NURSING_GRADE from EVALUATION_REPORT
